Description: Replay Guitar Exchange offers to you this Korean-made Schecter Tempest Custom with a black finish and gold Tone Pros hardware. This guitar was built from a contoured arched-top mahogany solidbody with a smooth three-piece mahogany neck and an extremely accessible ebony fingerboard. A Seymour Duncan Custom SH-11 humbucker sits at the bridge, while a Seymour Duncan '59 SH-1N humbucker is at the neck, putting out an aggressive and powerful array of tones. This guitar is in Fair condition, with various scratches and dings around the whole body and neck, and an estimated 85% of fret life remaining. Powerful and stunning, the Schecter Tempest Custom is a beautiful addition to any metal-heads collection, and it's available to own now at Replay Guitar Exchange! As always, feel free to contact our store for more details, or with any questions. Weight: 8 lbs. 8 oz. Neck material: 3-piece mahogany Scale length: 24.75" Nut width: 1.643" Fingerboard radius: 12" Neck shape: D Fingerboard material: ebony Frets: 22, jumbo Country of origin: Korea Hard shell case included Listing and template services provided by inkFrog
Title: Used Schecter Tempest Custom, Black
